About

I enjoy making mobile-first, full-stack web apps around fun APIs, custom artwork, and gamified experiences. I love learning about new Angular directives, front-end frameworks and mobile SDKs. You can find me competing at a hackathon, assisting programming students at Coding House, or attending a MeetUp.

Below, you will find some of my past graphics and production art. This is mostly from my work as a independent web comic artist and as a project manager and designer for a mobile app company. Thanks for stopping by!

-Samantha
Full-Stack JavaScript Developer for Hire

Explore California

After learning a little bit of everything, I built this app with two friends. We built a full-stack web app using Angular and Ionic(a mobile SDK) for iPhone. After this experience, I can say goodbye to my experiments with Java, Gradle and Android Studio. I love the ease of building web apps for mobile and wrapping them in beautiful mobile frameworks on top of SDK platforms.

  • Experience: To be shipped to iTunes store soon!
  • Code: GitHub
  • Tools: Ionic SDK, web scraping, JSON data, MEAN

BattleShip

One of my favorite things to do is interpret a familiar game into code. In this case, I made Battleship. Two players must join the game from different browsers to begin. I took advantage of Firebase's data persistance with this project.

  • Experience: ghPages
  • Code: My Github
  • Tools: Firebase, data persistence

A Quora Clone

This full stack app is the result of a team effort to recreate the site, Quora.

  • Experience: Heroku
  • Code: GitHub
  • Tools: Mongo, Angular, UI Router

jQuery Games

This is a simple game I made with jQuery, HTML and CSS animations. It's fun to work through game logic then prepare a game-win, game-over and game-lost 'state'.

  • See: Towers of Hanoi
  • Code: ghPages
  • Tools: jQuery, HTML, CSS, CSSAnimate

Weather App

Using Weather Underground's API, I showcased some data from two of their endpoints to retrieve the client's geolocation, and a webcam feed.

Using Google Maps API, I requested a satellite map of the clients location, with a data layer of earthquake activity, from U.S. Geological Service. This also made use of two endpoints.

  • See: Weather App | Earthquake Map
  • Code: Weather App | Earthquake Map
  • Tools: AJAX, APIs, JSON

Adopt a Ferret

This full stack application features state-based views made possible with Angular UI Router. This is a full-stack CRUD app for a mock animal shelter featuring ferrets!

  • See: Heroku
  • Code: GitHub
  • Tools: Express, Mongo, Angular, Bootstrap

Display Ads

When making various display ads, I test CTAs, colors, patterns, imagery, and language to generate the best results for our awareness and direct response campaigns.

A/B Test

Compelling

Retargeting
This is a highly specific retargeting campaign that specific url visitors saw and understood.
